snippet: The country, hit hard by Hurricane Matthew last month, has had as many as 3,500 new cases of the disease since the storm’s passage....
lead_paragraph: The country, hit hard by Hurricane Matthew last month, has had as many as 3,500 new cases of the disease since the storm’s passage.

headline.main: Haiti Opens a Drive to Vaccinate 820,000 as Cholera Flares
headline.print_headline: Cholera Flare-Up in Haiti Prompts a Vaccination Drive
